title.rendered: New Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max (128GB) – Gold

content.rendered:
6.7-inch Super Retina XDR show
Ceramic Shield, harder than any smartphone glass
A14 Bionic chip, the quickest chip ever in a smartphone
Pro digicam system with 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide and Telephoto cameras; 5x optical zoom vary; Night mode, Deep Fusion, (*12*) HDR 3, Apple ProRAW, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording
LiDAR Scanner for improved AR experiences, Night mode portraits

excerpt.rendered:
6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display
Ceramic Shield, tougher than any smartphone glass
A14 Bionic chip, the fastest chip ever in a smartphone
